seo.title: TechnoFiber | Fiberglass Reinforced Plastic (FRP) Products
seo.description: A leading manufacturer of high-quality FRP products in Egypt since 1996.

slides.title: TechnoFiber | Leading Manufacturer of FRP Products in Egypt – Established in 1996
slides.description: We design and manufacture all types of FRP products — handrails, walkways, stadium seats, tanks, and pultruded profiles. Superior quality, precision-engineered, proudly made in Egypt.
slides.imgAlt: TechnoFiber manufacturing facility in Egypt – Integrated pultrusion line for FRP products

slides.title: Durable FRP Tanks for Water and Chemical Storage
slides.description: 100% rust-proof FRP tanks engineered to withstand aggressive chemicals and high temperatures — the ideal solution for chemical processing and water treatment industries in Egypt.
slides.imgAlt: FRP storage tanks for chemicals and water – corrosion-resistant – TechnoFiber Egypt

slides.title: FRP Internal Components for Metro and Railway Vehicles
slides.description: High-strength FRP components designed for heavy-duty public transit environments — fire-resistant, lightweight, and engineered to meet metro and railway safety standards.
slides.imgAlt: FRP interior components for trains – durable and lightweight – TechnoFiber Egypt

slides.title: Superior FRP Handrails and Stair Systems
slides.description: Engineered for safety and longevity — our FRP handrails and stairs are non-conductive, impact-resistant, and weatherproof — perfect for industrial, marine, and commercial applications.
slides.imgAlt: FRP handrails and stair systems – weather and corrosion resistant – TechnoFiber

slides.title: FRP Guard Shacks & Toilet Cabins – Practical, Lightweight, Fast-Deploy Solutions
slides.description: TechnoFiber offers lightweight, modern-design FRP guard shacks and public toilet cabins built to endure Egypt’s harshest environments with minimal maintenance.
slides.imgAlt: FRP guard shacks – lightweight and corrosion-resistant – TechnoFiber Egypt

about.title: TechnoFiber – Egypt’s Leading FRP Manufacturer
about.intro: TechnoFiber is a market leader in FRP (Fiberglass Reinforced Plastic) products in Egypt, delivering strong, lightweight, and corrosion-resistant solutions for demanding industrial applications.
about.pultrusionText: We are the first company in Egypt to operate a complete pultrusion line, producing FRP profiles as a direct replacement for steel and aluminum.
about.gratingText: Egypt’s foremost manufacturer and supplier of FRP grating — renowned for durability, consistency, and performance.
about.bmcText: We produce high-performance BMC (Bulk Molding Compound) products using an integrated production line — an ideal alternative to metals and conventional plastics for high-strength applications.

clients.title: Our Trusted Partners
clients.description: We take pride in partnering with Egypt’s largest government institutions, industrial giants, and infrastructure developers.

features.sectionDesc: TechnoFiber delivers complete FRP solutions — from design and manufacturing to installation and nationwide distribution, backed by technical support across Egypt.
features.manufacturingText: Precision manufacturing of FRP products using advanced technologies to deliver unmatched strength, intelligent engineering, and reliable performance even under extreme conditions.
features.installationText: Professional on-site installation by certified teams, fully compliant with safety, quality, and schedule standards.
features.supplyText: Scheduled maintenance services and dedicated technical support for industrial and government sectors nationwide.

offers.sectionDesc: With decades of experience and a proven track record, we deliver innovative, durable, and sustainable FRP solutions.
offers.experienceDesc: Over three decades of innovation and excellence in FRP manufacturing.
offers.projectsDesc: Successfully delivered across Egypt and the Middle East.
offers.productsDesc: From gratings and tanks to custom pultrusions and specialized components.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Ready to support your industrial needs. Reach out for inquiries, quotations, or technical assistance.

headOffice.title: Head Office & Manufacturing Plants
headOffice.address: Abd El-Salam Abu Al-Ezz St., Behind Al-Jahiny Land, Qalioubia, Qalyub, Egypt

Contact.footerMessage: Whether you need technical consultation, a quotation, or on-site support — our team is ready to deliver reliable FRP solutions across Egypt and beyond.

industrial.title: Industrial FRP Products
industrial.desc: Robust FRP solutions engineered for demanding industrial environments

grating.title: FRP Grating | Corrosion-Resistant Industrial Walkways
grating.brief: High-quality FRP grating from TechnoFiber — Egypt’s top choice for industrial and commercial flooring projects.

grating-1.title: Cast FRP Grating | Chemical-Resistant Industrial Flooring
grating-1.brief: High-strength cast FRP grating for platforms, walkways, and corrosive environments — ideal for factories, plants, and marine applications.

grating-2.title: Heavy-Duty Cast FRP Grating | Anti-Slip Flooring for Harsh Environments
grating-2.brief: Premium industrial FRP grating with enhanced load capacity and acid resistance — perfect for chemical plants, wastewater facilities, and offshore platforms.

handrail.title: FRP Handrail & Stair Systems | Safe & Durable Safety Solutions
handrail.brief: Handrails and stair systems manufactured from fiberglass-reinforced plastic — made in Egypt by TechnoFiber.

handrail-1.title: Standard FRP Handrail System | Industrial Walkway Safety
handrail-1.brief: Standard FRP handrail for platforms, walkways, and access stairs. Resistant to rust, chemicals, and UV degradation.

handrail-2.title: Heavy-Duty Industrial FRP Handrail | High-Risk Area Safety Barriers
handrail-2.brief: Reinforced FRP handrail for high-traffic, corrosive zones — ideal for oil & gas, water treatment, and marine facilities.

pultrusion.title: FRP Pultruded Profiles | Replacement for Steel & Aluminum
pultrusion.brief: Egypt’s first full-scale pultrusion line produces FRP profiles that replace metal — zero rust, zero maintenance.

pultrusion-1.title: FRP I-Sections | Pultruded Structural Beams
pultrusion-1.brief: High-strength FRP I-beams for structural frameworks. 70% lighter than steel, completely corrosion-free, lifetime durability.

pultrusion-2.title: FRP Channels & Angles | Pultruded Structural Sections
pultrusion-2.brief: Versatile FRP channels and angles for supporting structures, cable trays, and platforms. Resistant to acids, salts, and extreme weather.

pultrusion-3.title: Round & Square FRP Pipes | Structural Pultruded Tubes
pultrusion-3.brief: Hollow FRP pipes for handrails, fencing, and structural frames. Non-conductive, lightweight, and ideal for electrical and corrosive areas.

urban.title: Smart Urban FRP Solutions | Municipal & Public Infrastructure
urban.desc: Lightweight, zero-maintenance, corrosion-free FRP products for smart cities — kiosks, manhole covers, junction boxes, and more. Made in Egypt by TechnoFiber.

kiosks.title: FRP Guard Shacks & Toilet Cabins
kiosks.brief: Weather-resistant FRP kiosks designed for durability and low maintenance.

kiosk-1.title: Smart FRP Kiosk | Emergency & Digital Service Stations
kiosk-1.brief: Interactive digital kiosk for emergency info and public services. Weather and vandalism-resistant — perfect for parks and plazas.

kiosk-2.title: Advertising FRP Kiosk | Public Toilet Cabins
kiosk-2.brief: Customizable FRP advertising kiosks with printable panels — ideal for high-density urban areas. Rust-proof and low-maintenance.

manhole.title: FRP Manhole Covers | Lightweight, Anti-Theft Sewer Covers
manhole.brief: Non-metallic, non-conductive, anti-theft covers resistant to corrosion and heavy loads — perfect for smart city infrastructure.

manhole-1.title: Round FRP Manhole Cover | Urban Sewage
manhole-1.brief: Lightweight round cover for sidewalks and streets — 70% lighter than cast iron, rust-free, easy to install and handle.

manhole-2.title: Square FRP Manhole Cover | Industrial Drainage
manhole-2.brief: Heavy-duty square cover for factories, airports, and utility zones. Resistant to chemicals and impact damage.

delivery.title: FRP Delivery Boxes | Secure Parcel Lockers
delivery.brief: TechnoFiber offers a wide range of FRP delivery locker designs.

delivery-1.title: FRP Delivery Box | Secure Parcel Locker
delivery-1.brief: Compact, wall-mountable locker for homes and small buildings. UV and moisture resistant, easy to install on poles or walls.

civil.title: Civil & Public FRP Solutions | Infrastructure, Storage & Safety
civil.desc: High-performance FRP products for civil infrastructure: metro interiors, chemical storage tanks, and child-safe playground equipment — designed in Egypt by TechnoFiber.

metro.title: Metro & Train Interior Components | Seats & Wall Linings
metro.brief: TechnoFiber manufactures lightweight, fire-resistant, corrosion-proof FRP interior components for metro cars — ideal for high-capacity transit systems.

metro-1.title: FRP Passenger Seats | Comfortable & Easy-Clean Seating
metro-1.brief: Molded FRP passenger seats with anti-slip surfaces, chemical resistance, and vandal-proof finish. Fully compliant with international rail safety standards.

metro-2.title: FRP Interior Wall & Ceiling Panels | Metro Car Linings
metro-2.brief: Custom FRP wall and ceiling panels for train compartments. Non-conductive, moisture-resistant, quick-install, reduce overall train weight and maintenance costs.

tanks.title: FRP Tanks | Corrosion-Free Storage for Water & Chemicals
tanks.brief: Custom-engineered FRP tanks for acids, wastewater, fuel, and chemicals. Leak-proof and ideal for all industrial applications.

tank-1.title: Vertical FRP Tank | Chemical & Water Treatment Storage
tank-1.brief: Vertical cylindrical tank for aggressive chemicals and water treatment plants. Capacities from 5,000L to 50,000L. FDA & ISO compliant, zero maintenance.

tank-2.title: Horizontal FRP Tank | Fuel & Wastewater Transport
tank-2.brief: Horizontal FRP tank for mobile transport of fuel, wastewater, or liquid waste. Reinforced for transit, leak-tested, and impact-resistant.

playground.title: FRP Children’s Playground Equipment | Safe, Durable & Colorful
playground.brief: Non-toxic, weather-resistant FRP playground equipment from TechnoFiber — safe for children in schools, parks, and sports clubs.

playground-1.title: FRP Climbing Structure | Outdoor Play Equipment
playground-1.brief: Colorful climbing frame with rounded edges and UV-stabilized finish — ideal for kindergartens and public parks. Easy to clean and sanitize.

playground-2.title: Integrated Slide & Swing Set | Complete FRP Playground Unit
playground-2.brief: All-in-one play unit with slide and swing, reinforced base. Resistant to heat, rain, and vandalism. Low maintenance, long lifespan.

playground-3.title: Sensory Play Panel | Interactive Educational Station
playground-3.brief: Interactive sensory panels for cognitive development. Perfect for inclusive parks. Made from non-toxic, recyclable FRP materials.

main.title: Explore Our Full Range of Industrial FRP Products
main.subtitle: Premium Quality Fiberglass Reinforced Plastic Solutions

ProductSlugPage.heroSubtitle: Professional FRP products designed exclusively for government institutions, industrial facilities, and infrastructure projects.

items.desc: High-strength, corrosion-resistant industrial flooring for factories, plants, and walkways.
Ideal for walkways, platforms, warehouses, and utilities. Non-rusting, electrically insulating, and weather/chemical resistant.

grating-2.title: FRP Checkered Plate | Heavy-Duty Anti-Slip Flooring for Harsh Environments

items.desc: Engineered for chemical plants, marine piers, and oil & gas facilities. Non-conductive, 100% metal replacement.
Non-conductive, rust-free safety barriers for stairs, platforms, and hazardous zones.
Factory-made for rapid installation in plants, water stations, and tank farms.

handrail-2.title: Heavy-Duty FRP Handrail Systems | Multiple Configurations

items.desc: Reinforced for oil & gas, wastewater, and marine facilities with superior load-bearing capacity.
Egypt’s first full pultrusion line. Custom shapes to replace steel and aluminum.

pultrusion-1.title: FRP Pultruded Profiles | Replacement for Steel & Aluminum

items.desc: FRP pultruded profiles — lighter than steel, rust-free for life. The optimal solution for industrial and marine environments.
Smart metal replacement for structural supports requiring long-term durability and reliable performance under harsh conditions.
Used for handrails, fencing, and electrical zones. Non-conductive and maintenance-free.
Weather-resistant and customizable for security and sanitation applications.
Weather-resistant and lightweight for outdoor security posts.
Customizable panels for signage and wayfinding — ideal for commercial centers, streets, and airports.

manhole.title: FRP Manhole Covers | Lightweight, Anti-Theft Drain Covers

items.desc: Lightweight, theft-resistant, and corrosion-proof — ideal for smart cities and municipal projects.
Lightweight, non-conductive, and corrosion-resistant sewer cover. Suitable for sidewalks, roads, and pedestrian zones with high load capacity.

manhole-2.title: Square FRP Manhole Cover | Heavy-Duty Industrial Drainage

items.desc: Engineered for industrial zones, airports, and stormwater networks. Withstands heavy loads, impacts, and chemical exposure while ensuring efficient drainage.

delivery.title: FRP Delivery Boxes | Secure Parcel Lockers

items.desc: Secure delivery lockers for safe package handling.

delivery-1.title: FRP Delivery Box | Secure Parcel Locker

items.desc: Impact-resistant design. The ultimate solution for secure last-mile delivery.
Integrated FRP interior components for metro cars — including seats and flooring. Fire-resistant, lightweight, and easy to clean and maintain.
Comfortably molded FRP seats with anti-slip surface, chemical resistance, and vandal-proof finish — ideal for metro and electric rail systems.

Custom-engineered FRP tanks by TechnoFiber for storing acids, fuel, and wastewater — leak-proof, corrosion-free, and maintenance-free. The ultimate long-term solution for industrial and commercial facilities requiring reliability and safety.

tank-1.title: Vertical FRP Tank | For Chemicals & Water Treatment

items.desc: Vertical cylindrical FRP tank ideal for chemical plants and water treatment stations. Available in capacities from 5,000L to 50,000L. Easy to clean and inspect, zero rust, zero maintenance.

tank-2.title: Rectangular/Horizontal FRP Tank | Industrial Storage & Transport

items.desc: Space-efficient rectangular FRP tank for fuel, water, or wastewater storage and transport. Leak-tested, impact-resistant, and optimized for mobility.
Spherical-shaped FRP tank with exceptional pressure and impact resistance. Certified for industrial storage applications.
Horizontal cylindrical tank suitable for underground or above-ground storage. Leak-proof, lightweight, and easy to install.
FRP cooling towers used in factories, hospitals, and water/wastewater treatment plants. Known for durability and corrosion resistance.

Outdoor playground equipment made from FRP — non-toxic, weather-resistant, fade-proof, and brightly colored to attract children. Zero rust, zero maintenance. Ideal for public parks, schools, and residential complexes.

playground-1.title: FRP Climbing Frame | Safe Children's Play Equipment

items.desc: Climbing structure made from FRP by TechnoFiber — perfect for kindergartens and public parks.

playground-2.title: Integrated Slide & Swing Set | Complete FRP Playground Unit

items.desc: Complete play unit from TechnoFiber combining slide and swing in one durable FRP structure. Resistant to rust and humidity.

trustSection.title: Trusted by Government Institutions
trustSection.description: Our products meet the highest international standards for government and industrial applications, ensuring reliability, durability, and compliance with global quality benchmarks.

compliance.title: Certifications & Compliance
compliance.desc: Our products are manufactured in compliance with international standards including ISO, ASTM, and EN.
